= `tagToElsePHP` =
[http://code.google.com/p/querytemplates/w/list Wiki] > [Syntax Syntax] > [elseSyntax else] > [tagToElsePHPMethod tagToElsePHP]
=== Parameters ===


Replaces selected tag with PHP "else" statement.


Method doesn't change selected elements stack. Returned is source element,  detached from it's parent.


Example
{{{
 $template['.else']->tagToElsePHP();

}}}
Source
{{{
 <div class='else'><node1/></div>

}}}
Result
{{{
 <?php
 else {
 ?><node1/><?php
 }
 ?>

}}}
----


=== Comments allowed ===
